function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limitations in the identification of confounding factors impacting the final analysis of included articles","Impact":"Reduced accuracy of statistical analysis and inability to establish cause-effect relationship","Mitigation":"Improved identification and control of confounding factors, use of advanced statistical methods to account for confounding variables","Technologies":"Advanced statistical analysis tools","People":"Research community, public health officials","Owner":"Research community, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of secondary data due to the urgency of the global situation with the rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Possibility of less accurate data leading to bias and uncertainty in results","Mitigation":"Validation of secondary data sources, incorporation of real-time data, and cautious interpretation of results","Technologies":"Real-time data collection and validation tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Extrapolation of results from studies conducted before the outbreak to the spread characteristics of COVID-19 worldwide","Impact":"Potential for inaccuracies in the relevance of the results to the current global situation","Mitigation":"Validation of extrapolation through current data analysis and cross-validation with real-time observations","Technologies":"Real-time global data monitoring and analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
